thread.title: Wild koala makes best friends with a dog in Adelaide
thread.title_full: Wild koala makes best friends with a dog in Adelaide | Daily Mail Online

author: Chris Pleasance For Daily Mail Australia
title: Wild koala makes best friends with a dog in Adelaide
text:
They say dogs are man's best friend - but if this video is anything to go by then it seems dogs may not feel the same way.
That's because this dog has made best friends with a wild koala who just happened to wander into its family's backyard.
The fluffy duo were filmed admiring each other through a glass door at a home in Adelaide , South Australia.
This is the adorable moment a koala and dog became best friends after the marsupial wandered into a family's back yard
The koala walked over to the family's glass back door where it sat down opposite the curious canine, with the owner saying the pair spent a while together
Footage shows the wild marsupial wandering into the backyard before immediately making its way over to the door.
Once there, the family's dog comes and sits down opposite it before the two spend several minutes staring at each other through the glass.
Eventually the koala and dog bid each other adieu so the marsupial can carry on with its day.
The Quote: : 'The koala spent a fair bit of time with the dog before heading off to a new tree.'
The unusual meeting was caught on camera by pet owners in Adelaide, South Australia
After a while with his new friend, the koala wandered away to find another tree to sit in
